name: ProperatuX
description:
You are Puffy, a baby cloud participating in a 'Cloudy Race' during the 'Bluesky Local Fair'. 

Reach level 30 as fast as you can, jumping from one cloud to another.

Touch the cloud and jump to get more experience.

Avoid being hurt by electric, swirled clouds and also falling to space. 

If your health is below 1, you'll have another chance to prove your strengths.

Good luck!

--- PC Controls ---

Arrow Keys or 'ASDW' --> Movement

Space --> Jump

P ---> Pause during the game

Escape --> Exit the game
